description.english: Scavenge 10 items off of bodies/walkers during the night
description.german: Plündere nachts 10 Gegenstände aus Leichen und Streunern.
description.french: Récupérer 10 objets sur des cadavres ou des rôdeurs de nuit
description.italian: Recupera 10 oggetti da cadaveri o vaganti durante la notte
description.spanish: Saquea 10 objetos de los cuerpos o caminantes durante la noche
description.schinese: 在夜晚从尸体/行尸身上搜刮到 10 件物品
description.russian: Соберите ночью 10 предметов с тел людей или ходячих.
description.japanese: 夜の間に死体またはウォーカーからアイテムを10個収集する
description.brazilian: Tire 10 itens de cadáveres ou caminhantes durante a noite.

displayName.french: La vie est comme un feu d'artifice

description.spanish: Mata a Whistles con un explosivo
description.schinese: 使用炸药杀死哨姐
description.japanese: 爆発物を使ってホイッスルズを殺す
description.brazilian: Mate a Whistles com um explosivo.
